message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SOC

Reasoning: The paper deals with a recommendation system for news articles based on clustering and bias analysis. This involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques for analyzing the content of news articles, which falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The system also involves scraping news articles from various sources, which could fall under the sub-category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The system also aims to address the issue of political polarization, which could fall under the sub-category of Cybersecurity (cs.CY) and Social and Economic Networks (cs.SOC).
